review: Visited his clinic for the first time on 2nd Jan 22 and  I am more than satisfied. Despite being quite busy, he listened to me very patiently and clarified various points bothering me ever since a stent was implanted in my LAD in November 2020.  He is quite polite and explains things the way one expects from a doctor.  I have certainly gained a lot of confidence after this visit.  I recommend the doctor.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,
review: Blown by professionalism completely.  ** ******** ********* ******** ** we were being there for our kid generic checkup but wants full settlement of Rs 600 as his time was wasted not ours. Thank you.

Visited for Chest pain but doctor got to many things tested. Full body check up for chest pain like urine examination, LFT, KFT etc. are not required. I confirmed this with other doctor. I understand that heart check up are required these days due to rising cases but ECG, ECHO are enough. I was told lipid profile test all time but instead full body check up was done. You can visit doctor but be ready to say no to extra tests.
